test_cases.Title: Abbreviation Table Validation_XXX_RF_Application_TEST_Desktop_Verifying the display of abbreviations in the application

Steps.Step Description: Open the application containing the abbreviation table.
Steps.Expected Result: The application opens successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the section of the application displaying the abbreviation table.
Steps.Expected Result: The section displaying the abbreviation table is accessible.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the abbreviation 'SE' is present and displays 'SuperEnalotto'.
Steps.Expected Result: 'SE' is listed and corresponds to 'SuperEnalotto'.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the abbreviation 'RU' is present and displays 'Requisiti utente'.
Steps.Expected Result: 'RU' is listed and corresponds to 'Requisiti utente'.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the abbreviation 'RF' is present and displays 'Requisito Funzionale'.
Steps.Expected Result: 'RF' is listed and corresponds to 'Requisito Funzionale'.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the abbreviation 'US' is present and displays 'Use Case'.
Steps.Expected Result: 'US' is listed and corresponds to 'Use Case'.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the abbreviation 'FE/BE' is present and displays 'Front End/Back End'.
Steps.Expected Result: 'FE/BE' is listed and corresponds to 'Front End/Back End'.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the abbreviation 'APP SEG' is present and displays 'SuperEnalotto e Giochi'.
Steps.Expected Result: 'APP SEG' is listed and corresponds to 'SuperEnalotto e Giochi'.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the abbreviation 'APP SEVV' is present and displays 'SuperEnalotto Verifica Vincite'.
Steps.Expected Result: 'APP SEVV' is listed and corresponds to 'SuperEnalotto Verifica Vincite'.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has access to the application displaying the abbreviation table.
test_cases.Expected Result: All abbreviations are correctly displayed in the application.
test_cases._polarion: Definizioni e abbreviazioni
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Test covers only abbreviation display; does not test interaction functionalities.

test_cases.Title: Missing Abbreviation Error Handling_XXX_RF_Application_TEST_Mobile_Check that missing abbreviation results in error message

Steps.Step Description: Open the application containing the abbreviation table.
Steps.Expected Result: The application opens successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the section of the application displaying the abbreviation table.
Steps.Expected Result: The section displaying the abbreviation table is accessible.

Steps.Step Description: Simulate missing abbreviation entry (e.g., modify the data source).
Steps.Expected Result: The application should have a mechanism to handle missing data.

Steps.Step Description: Observe the application behavior when trying to load the table with missing abbreviation.
Steps.Expected Result: An appropriate error message is displayed indicating missing abbreviations.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has access to the mobile application and the ability to simulate data manipulation.
test_cases.Expected Result: The application handles missing abbreviation entries gracefully with an error message.
test_cases._polarion: Definizioni e abbreviazioni
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Test covers only missing data handling; does not cover valid abbreviation scenarios.

test_cases.Title: Mobile_Login_Functionality_001_AppIOS_TEST_iOS_performing login on iOS app

Steps.Step Description: Open the Mobile App on an iOS device.
Steps.Expected Result: The Mobile App launches successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the login screen by tapping the 'Login' button.
Steps.Expected Result: The login screen is displayed with input fields for username and password.

Steps.Step Description: Enter valid credentials in the username and password fields.
Steps.Expected Result: The credentials are accepted without error.

Steps.Step Description: Tap the 'Submit' button to log in.
Steps.Expected Result: The user is redirected to the Home page of the app.

test_cases.Preconditions: The user has a valid account and the app is installed.
test_cases.Expected Result: User successfully logs in and navigates to the Home page.
test_cases._polarion: Descrizione generale
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the login process; session management is not included.

test_cases.Title: Mobile_Register_Functionality_002_AppAndroid_TEST_Android_testing user registration on Android app

Steps.Step Description: Launch the Android app on a Android device.
Steps.Expected Result: The app opens successfully to the welcome screen.

Steps.Step Description: Tap on the 'Register' link to navigate to the registration screen.
Steps.Expected Result: The registration form is presented.

Steps.Step Description: Fill in the registration form with valid data and tap 'Create Account'.
Steps.Expected Result: The system successfully registers the user and shows a confirmation message.

test_cases.Preconditions: The app must be installed on the device.
test_cases.Expected Result: User registration is successful and access to the application is granted.
test_cases._polarion: Descrizione generale
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers user registration process; email verification is not included.

test_cases.Title: Desktop_Password_Reset_Functionality_003_Desktop_TEST_Desktop_executing password reset on desktop app

Steps.Step Description: Open the desktop application on a Windows PC.
Steps.Expected Result: The desktop application launches without issues.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the 'Forgot Password?' link on the login screen.
Steps.Expected Result: The password reset page is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Enter the registered email address and submit the request.
Steps.Expected Result: A confirmation message indicates that a password reset email has been sent.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has a registered account and the application is installed.
test_cases.Expected Result: Password reset email is successfully sent to the user's registered email.
test_cases._polarion: Descrizione generale
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers the initiation of password reset only; does not validate the link in the email.

test_cases.Title: AI_Angel_Numerica_001_Functionality_GNTN_CLIENT_TEST_Desktop_initialization of AI Angel Numerica in GNTN Client

Steps.Step Description: Open the GNTN game client application.
Steps.Expected Result: The GNTN game client application launches successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the section for the new AI Angel Numerica feature.
Steps.Expected Result: The AI Angel Numerica feature section is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the 'Start AI Angel Numerica' button.
Steps.Expected Result: The AI Angel Numerica assistant is initialized and ready for interaction.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have the GNTN Client installed and access to the application.
test_cases.Expected Result: AI Angel Numerica assistant is initialized successfully.
test_cases._polarion: Scopo ed ambito di applicazione
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the initialization process; functionality interaction not tested.

test_cases.Title: AI_Angel_Numerica_002_Functionality_GNTN_CLIENT_TEST_Desktop_interaction with AI Angel Numerica

Steps.Step Description: Open the GNTN game client application and initialize AI Angel Numerica.
Steps.Expected Result: AI Angel Numerica assistant is initialized.

Steps.Step Description: Input a random number combination into the AI assistant.
Steps.Expected Result: AI acknowledges the input and processes the combination.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the 'Get Combination' button.
Steps.Expected Result: The AI generates and displays a random combination for SuperEnalotto.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have the GNTN Client initialized with AI Angel Numerica.
test_cases.Expected Result: AI generates and displays a valid number combination.
test_cases._polarion: Scopo ed ambito di applicazione
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Focuses on AI interactions but does not cover error handling scenarios.

test_cases.Title: AI_Angel_Numerica_003_Functionality_GNTN_CLIENT_TEST_Desktop_error handling of invalid input

Steps.Step Description: Open the GNTN game client application and initialize AI Angel Numerica.
Steps.Expected Result: AI Angel Numerica assistant is initialized.

Steps.Step Description: Enter an invalid number combination (e.g., letters or special characters).
Steps.Expected Result: AI raises an error message indicating invalid input.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to get a combination using the invalid input.
Steps.Expected Result: AI does not process the request and provides appropriate feedback.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have the GNTN Client initialized with AI Angel Numerica.
test_cases.Expected Result: AI properly handles invalid input with an appropriate error message.
test_cases._polarion: Scopo ed ambito di applicazione
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Focused on error handling; does not test valid scenario flows.

test_cases.Title: Integration_GNTN_Vivocha_TEST_Desktop_Verifying the integration between GNTN game client and Vivocha AI

Steps.Step Description: Launch the GNTN game client application.
Steps.Expected Result: The GNTN game client application starts successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Initiate interaction with the Vivocha AI through the specified integration point.
Steps.Expected Result: The integration interface is displayed, indicating a successful connection with Vivocha AI.

Steps.Step Description: Perform a test input to the Vivocha AI (e.g., sending a message).
Steps.Expected Result: The input is processed, and a response is received within the expected time frame.

test_cases.Expected Result: Integration with Vivocha AI performs correctly, and responses are received as expected.
test_cases._polarion: Relazioni con altri sistemi
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Focuses primarily on the initial connection and basic input/output functionality.

Steps.Expected Result: The GNTN game client opens without issues.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the feature that interacts with the external platform.
Steps.Expected Result: The user is navigated to the interaction feature without errors.

test_cases.Title: Chat Access_001_User_LoggedIn_TEST_Desktop_Verifying chat access for logged-in user

Steps.Step Description: Set the variable window.isUserLoggedIn to 1.
Steps.Expected Result: The system recognizes that the user is logged in.

Steps.Step Description: Access the chat functionality.
Steps.Expected Result: The chat is accessed without displaying the privacy banner.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is logged into the system.
test_cases.Expected Result: User accesses the chat without seeing the privacy banner.
test_cases._polarion: Differenza tra utente loggato e non loggato
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers access without a privacy banner; does not include chat features.

test_cases.Title: Chat Access_002_User_NotLoggedIn_TEST_Desktop_Verifying chat access for non-logged-in user

Steps.Step Description: Set the variable window.isUserLoggedIn to 0.
Steps.Expected Result: The system recognizes that the user is not logged in.

Steps.Step Description: Access the chat functionality.
Steps.Expected Result: The chat is accessed and the privacy banner is displayed.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is not logged into the system.
test_cases.Expected Result: User accesses the chat and sees the privacy banner.
test_cases._polarion: Differenza tra utente loggato e non loggato
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers access with the privacy banner; chat functionalities not included.

test_cases.Title: privacyLink_ClickHandling_001_WebApp_PRIVACY_INFO_TEST_Desktop_Testing the handling of the privacy link click

Steps.Step Description: Open the web application containing the privacy link in the banner.
Steps.Expected Result: The web application is displayed correctly.

Steps.Step Description: Locate and click on the privacy link in the banner.
Steps.Expected Result: The click action is captured, and the parameter 'CLICK_PRIVACY_INFO' is sent via the 'sendMessageToApp(data)' service.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is on the page with the privacy link in the banner.
test_cases.Expected Result: The parameter 'CLICK_PRIVACY_INFO' is sent successfully to the Game Client.
test_cases._polarion: Gestione link privacy
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only click handling; document display verification not included.

test_cases.Title: privacyLink_PostMessage_002_App_SENDING_POST_MESSAGE_TEST_Mobile_Testing the postMessage sent to the web container

Steps.Step Description: Simulate the receipt of 'CLICK_PRIVACY_INFO' by the Game Client.
Steps.Expected Result: The Game Client acknowledges the receipt of the notification.

Steps.Step Description: Observe the action in the Game Client that triggers a postMessage to the web container.
Steps.Expected Result: A postMessage is sent to the web container to prepare for opening the privacy document.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has triggered the privacy link click and received notifications on the Game Client.
test_cases.Expected Result: The web container is notified to prepare for opening the privacy document.
test_cases._polarion: Gestione link privacy
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers sending postMessage; verification of document opening not included.

test_cases.Title: privacyLink_DocumentOpenVerification_003_Backend_DOCUMENT_OPEN_TEST_Backend_Verifying the document opens correctly

Steps.Step Description: After postMessage is triggered, verify that the document link is accessible from the web container.
Steps.Expected Result: The document link '[Web privacy policy](https://www.giochinumerici.info/content/dam/gntn/gntn/documents/privacy/Webprivacypolicy_CookieIT_SITIPUBBLICI_Aprile2023.pdf)' is reachable.

Steps.Step Description: Open the document link in a new tab or window.
Steps.Expected Result: The privacy policy document displays correctly without errors.

test_cases.Preconditions: PostMessage has been successfully sent and the web container is ready to open the document.
test_cases.Expected Result: The privacy policy document opens without any loading issues.
test_cases._polarion: Gestione link privacy
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers document opening; content accuracy not verified.

test_cases.Title: Error Handling Chat Resource_001_CLIENT_ChatFunctionality_TEST_Mobile_Showing generic error modal when chat resource does not load

test_cases.Title: PostMessage Integration_Mobile_IOS_Test_Mobile_Ensure PostMessage events are handled correctly within the app

Steps.Step Description: Validate that the correct data from the PostMessage is displayed to the user.
Steps.Expected Result: The application displays the correct event information as intended.

test_cases.Title: Analytics Tracking_001_Web_Client_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the web client application for the game.
Steps.Expected Result: The game client web application is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Interact with various features in the game client (e.g., play a game, access the leaderboard).
Steps.Expected Result: The features are accessed successfully without any errors.

Steps.Step Description: Check the network requests sent to the analytics tracking endpoint.
Steps.Expected Result: Analytics data is sent correctly to the tracking endpoint.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is logged into the game client with a valid account.
test_cases.Expected Result: Analytics tracking is successfully monitored for user interactions.
test_cases._polarion: Analisi della specifica non funzionale – tracciamenti analytics
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Focus on tracking data sending; does not verify analytics data interpretation.

Steps.Expected Result: The mobile game application starts successfully.

Steps.Expected Result: All sections are navigated without errors.

Steps.Step Description: Check the analytics tracking during navigation to specific features.
Steps.Expected Result: Tracking information is sent to the appropriate analytics service.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has installed the latest version of the mobile app.
test_cases.Expected Result: Analytics data is captured during user interactions within the mobile app.

test_cases.Title: Analytics Tracking_003_App_Client_TEST_iOS

Steps.Step Description: Open the game application on an iOS device.
Steps.Expected Result: The game app launches properly.

Steps.Step Description: Perform various interactions (e.g., playing a game, viewing user profile).
Steps.Expected Result: Interactions are performed without any malfunctions.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the analytics logs are generated for the interactions.
Steps.Expected Result: Analytics logs are present and accurately reflect the user's actions.

test_cases.Expected Result: Analytics tracking functions correctly for all user actions.

test_cases.Title: User_Login_Functionality_001_Web_TEST_Desktop_Verification of successful login using valid credentials

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the application's login page.
Steps.Expected Result: The login page is displayed with username and password fields.

Steps.Step Description: Input a valid username and password.
Steps.Expected Result: The entered values are correctly displayed in their respective fields.

Steps.Step Description: Click the 'Login' button.
Steps.Expected Result: The user is redirected to the dashboard page.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must be registered and have valid credentials.
test_cases.Expected Result: User successfully logs in and is directed to the dashboard.
test_cases._polarion: CASI D'USO
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers successful login only; failed login scenarios not included.

test_cases.Title: Password_Reset_Functionality_002_Web_TEST_Desktop_Verification of password reset process using registered email

Steps.Step Description: Access the login page and click on 'Forgot Password'.
Steps.Expected Result: The password reset page is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Enter the registered email address and submit the form.
Steps.Expected Result: A message indicating that a reset email has been sent is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Check the email inbox for password reset instructions.
Steps.Expected Result: An email with password reset instructions is received.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have a registered email address.
test_cases.Expected Result: Password reset process is initiated successfully.
test_cases._polarion: CASI D'USO
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Only tests the sending of the reset email; does not verify email content.

test_cases.Title: User_Registration_Functionality_003_Web_TEST_Desktop_Verification of successful user registration with valid input

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the registration page.
Steps.Expected Result: Registration form is displayed with required fields.

Steps.Step Description: Input valid details (username, email, password) into the registration form.
Steps.Expected Result: Entered values are displayed correctly in the respective fields.

Steps.Step Description: Submit the registration form.
Steps.Expected Result: A confirmation message indicating successful registration is displayed.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must not already have an account.
test_cases.Expected Result: User registration is completed successfully.
test_cases._polarion: CASI D'USO
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Tests only successful registration; does not cover validation of inputs.

test_cases.Title: Game Client_After Combination Enter_First_Row_Schedina_TEST_Desktop_User enters the combination in the first available row

Steps.Step Description: User opens the game page in ticket mode.
Steps.Expected Result: The game page is displayed with available ticket options.

Steps.Step Description: User clicks on the CTA "Find Numbers with Your Dreams".
Steps.Expected Result: The chat with AI Angel Numera is initiated.

Steps.Step Description: User describes their dream to the AI Angel Numera.
Steps.Expected Result: AI Angel Numera provides a combination based on the user’s dream description.

Steps.Step Description: User clicks the "Insert" button.
Steps.Expected Result: The combination is sent to the game client.

Steps.Step Description: The game client receives the combination through the *sendMessageToApp(data)* call.
Steps.Expected Result: The combination is successfully received.

Steps.Step Description: User checks the first available row of the ticket.
Steps.Expected Result: The first empty row is displayed to the user.

Steps.Step Description: Client fills the first available row with the received combination.
Steps.Expected Result: The first row of the ticket is successfully filled with the combination.

test_cases.Preconditions: At least one combination must be available/empty on the ticket.
test_cases.Expected Result: The combination is inserted into the first available row of the ticket.
test_cases._polarion: Caso d'uso 1 - Compilazione schedina vuota (Happy flow)
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers normal flow of entering a combination; error scenarios not included.

test_cases.Title: Game Client_Empty Ticket_Validation_INSERT_Test_Desktop_Verifying Invalid Insertion

Steps.Step Description: User opens the game page in ticket mode.
Steps.Expected Result: The game page is displayed with available ticket options.

Steps.Step Description: User clicks on the CTA "Insert" without any input.
Steps.Expected Result: An error message is displayed indicating that the ticket cannot be filled without a combination.

test_cases.Preconditions: The game page is open and the ticket is empty.
test_cases.Expected Result: Error message indicates the ticket cannot be completed with an empty form.
test_cases._polarion: Caso d'uso 1 - Compilazione schedina vuota (Happy flow)
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers invalid combination insertion; valid flow is not tested.

test_cases.Title: AI Integration_001_Client_GNTN_TEST_Desktop_AI Angel Numera Combination Insertion

Steps.Step Description: Open the game SE page in combination entry mode.
Steps.Expected Result: The game SE page is displayed with the option to enter combinations.

Steps.Step Description: Manually enter or select random/favorite four combinations.
Steps.Expected Result: Four combinations appear in the entry fields.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the 'Find numbers with your dreams' button.
Steps.Expected Result: The system initiates a call to the Vivocha scripts.

Steps.Step Description: Wait for the chat to start.
Steps.Expected Result: The chat interface opens for the user to describe their dream.

Steps.Step Description: Describe a dream to the AI Angel Numera.
Steps.Expected Result: The AI processes the description and generates a combination.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the 'Insert' button to send the generated combination.
Steps.Expected Result: The combination is sent to the Client GNTN through Vivocha.

Steps.Step Description: Confirm that the chat closes.
Steps.Expected Result: The chat interface is no longer visible.

Steps.Step Description: Check the entry fields for the fifth combination.
Steps.Expected Result: The fifth combination from the AI Angel Numera is inserted in the available slot.

test_cases.Preconditions: At least one combination must be available for entry.
test_cases.Expected Result: The fifth combination is successfully inserted from the AI Angel Numera.
test_cases._polarion: Caso d'uso 2 – Compilazione schedina parzialmente valorizzata (da 1 a 8)
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only combination insertion; error handling not included.

test_cases.Title: AI Integration_002_Client_GNTN_TEST_Desktop_Empty Slot Handling for AI Combination

Steps.Step Description: Open the game SE page in combination entry mode.
Steps.Expected Result: The game SE page is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Enter three combinations manually.
Steps.Expected Result: Three combinations are visible in the entry fields.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the 'Find numbers with your dreams' button.
Steps.Expected Result: Call to Vivocha scripts is initiated.

Steps.Step Description: Describe a dream to the AI Angel Numera.
Steps.Expected Result: AI generates a combination based on the description.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the 'Insert' button.
Steps.Expected Result: The combination is sent to the Client GNTN.

Steps.Step Description: Check the combination entry.
Steps.Expected Result: The first available empty slot is filled with the AI-generated combination.

test_cases.Preconditions: Only three out of five combination slots are filled.
test_cases.Expected Result: The AI-generated combination is inserted into the first available empty slot.
test_cases._polarion: Caso d'uso 2 – Compilazione schedina parzialmente valorizzata (da 1 a 8)
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Only the handling of available slots is covered; input validation missing.

test_cases.Title: insert_combination_AI_001_Client_InsertCombination_TEST_Desktop_User inserts combination from AI Angel Numera

Steps.Step Description: Open the game page in combination mode.
Steps.Expected Result: The game page loads successfully in combination mode.

Steps.Step Description: Manually fill in the first 9 combinations.
Steps.Expected Result: 9 combinations are filled in the selection fields.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the CTA 'Find the numbers with your dreams'.
Steps.Expected Result: The system initiates a call to the game client towards the Vivocha scripts.

Steps.Step Description: Chat window opens and user describes their dream.
Steps.Expected Result: The chat interface appears and the user is able to send their dream description.

Steps.Step Description: AI Angel Numera provides a combination based on the user's dream.
Steps.Expected Result: The AI provides a new combination.

Steps.Step Description: User clicks on 'Insert'.
Steps.Expected Result: The system prepares to send the combination to the game client.

Steps.Step Description: Vivocha sends the combination to the game client via sendMessageToApp(data).
Steps.Expected Result: The combination is transmitted to the game client successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Ensure the combination is inserted in the last available row of the combination sheet.
Steps.Expected Result: The new combination is added to the first available line of the sheet.

Steps.Step Description: Close the chat and verify that quick actions are hidden, displaying only the 'Clear all' CTA.
Steps.Expected Result: The chat is closed and only the 'Clear all' option is visible.

test_cases.Preconditions: At least one combination must be empty/available.
test_cases.Expected Result: User successfully inserts the AI-generated combination into the game sheet.
test_cases._polarion: Caso d'uso 3 – Compilazione schedina con ultima combinazione disponibile (9 compilate)
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers insertion of AI generated combination; does not cover invalid input cases.

test_cases.Title: handle_empty_combination_slot_002_Client_ManageCombinations_TEST_Desktop_User checks empty slots

Steps.Step Description: Open the game page in combination mode.
Steps.Expected Result: The game page loads successfully in combination mode.

Steps.Step Description: Check if at least one of the first 9 combination slots is empty.
Steps.Expected Result: At least one slot is confirmed to be empty.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to insert a combination from AI Angel Numera.
Steps.Expected Result: The system allows the insertion since there is an available slot.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is on the game page with multiple slots.
test_cases.Expected Result: User can identify that there is at least one empty slot available for combination insertion.
test_cases._polarion: Caso d'uso 3 – Compilazione schedina con ultima combinazione disponibile (9 compilate)
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Checks that the system recognizes empty slots for combination insertion.

test_cases.Title: Game Client UI_AngleNumerAI_003_UI_ACTION_DESKTOP_Validate_Hidden_CTA

Steps.Step Description: Open the game client page in the betting slip mode.
Steps.Expected Result: The game client page is displayed with the betting slip interface.

Steps.Step Description: Manually fill in all 10 combinations in the betting slip.
Steps.Expected Result: All 10 combinations are correctly filled in the betting slip.

Steps.Step Description: Observe the interface for any displayed CTAs related to AI Angel Numera.
Steps.Expected Result: The CTAs related to AI Angel Numera are not displayed, only 'Clear All' is visible.

test_cases.Preconditions: All combinations must be filled in manually.
test_cases.Expected Result: CTAs for AI Angel Numera are not displayed.
test_cases._polarion: Caso d'uso 4 – Schedina con tutte le combinazioni compilate
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Validates the absence of AI-specific CTAs; does not cover error handling.

test_cases.Title: Game Client Clear All_AngleNumerAI_004_UI_ACTION_DESKTOP_Validate_Clear_Actions

Steps.Step Description: Open the game client and ensure all 10 combinations are filled.
Steps.Expected Result: The betting slip displays all 10 entered combinations.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the 'Clear All' button.
Steps.Expected Result: The game client clears the betting slip and shows all available quick actions.

test_cases.Preconditions: All combinations in the betting slip must be filled before executing this test.
test_cases.Expected Result: The betting slip is cleared, and all quick actions are shown.
test_cases._polarion: Caso d'uso 4 – Schedina con tutte le combinazioni compilate
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Validates clearing functionality without checking if actions restore correctly.

test_cases.Title: Chat Persistence_001_GAME_Client_Test_Desktop_Check if chat persists after minimizing

Steps.Step Description: Open the gaming client and navigate to the SE game page.
Steps.Expected Result: The SE game page is displayed successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the 'Find Numbers with Your Dreams' CTA.
Steps.Expected Result: The chat with AI Angel Numera initiates.

Steps.Step Description: Describe a dream in the chat interface.
Steps.Expected Result: The AI Angel Numera responds with a number combination.

Steps.Step Description: Minimize the chat window.
Steps.Expected Result: The chat window is minimized successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the 'Next' button to proceed to the next step.
Steps.Expected Result: The user navigates to the next step in the game.

Steps.Step Description: Return to the SE game page and click on 'Continue the conversation' button.
Steps.Expected Result: The chat reopens with the previous messages intact.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has launched the chat with AI Angel Numera.
test_cases.Expected Result: The chat is displayed in its previous state with all interactions preserved.
test_cases._polarion: Caso d'uso 5 – Ripresa della conversazione dopo passaggio a step di pagamento
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Tests only the persistence feature, not the chat content analysis.

test_cases.Title: Chat Resumption_002_GAME_Client_Test_Desktop_Test chat resumes correctly after returning

Steps.Step Description: Launch the gaming client and go to the SE game's chat.
Steps.Expected Result: The gaming client opens with the SE game chat ready.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the 'Find Numbers with Your Dreams' CTA.
Steps.Expected Result: The chat with AI Angel Numera starts as expected.

Steps.Step Description: Engage in conversation with AI Angel Numera.
Steps.Expected Result: AI responds correctly to user messages.

Steps.Step Description: Click to minimize the chat before switching.
Steps.Expected Result: The chat window is minimized and still active in the background.

Steps.Step Description: Return to the SE gaming page after playing.
Steps.Expected Result: The gaming page loads successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Click on 'Continue the conversation'.
Steps.Expected Result: The chat window resumes at the last message.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has ongoing chat interaction with AI Angel Numera.
test_cases.Expected Result: The chat session resumes correctly with the latest messages intact.
test_cases._polarion: Caso d'uso 5 – Ripresa della conversazione dopo passaggio a step di pagamento
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Focuses on the chat resumption feature only.

test_cases.Title: Chat Restore Functionality_001_Client_GNTN_TEST_Desktop_Verifying chat restoration after switching game modes

Steps.Step Description: User opens the SE game page in ticket mode.
Steps.Expected Result: The SE game page is displayed without errors.

Steps.Step Description: User clicks on the CTA 'Find the numbers with your dreams'.
Steps.Expected Result: The client initiates a call to Vivocha scripts successfully.

Steps.Step Description: User describes their dream in the chat.
Steps.Expected Result: AI Angel Numera provides a combination response.

Steps.Step Description: User minimizes the chat and switches to another game mode.
Steps.Expected Result: User can switch modes without issues.

Steps.Step Description: User navigates back to the ticket game page and clicks 'Continue the conversation'.
Steps.Expected Result: The chat is restored to the exact state it was left at.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has initiated the Numera chat.
test_cases.Expected Result: User can continue the chat seamlessly without losing any information.
test_cases._polarion: Caso d'uso 6 - Ripresa della conversazione dopo passaggio ad altre modalità di gioco
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Only covers the chat restoration; functionality during the new game mode not tested.

test_cases.Title: Chat Interaction Stability_002_Client_GNTN_TEST_Desktop_Testing message retention during chat

Steps.Step Description: User initiates a chat with AI Angel Numera.
Steps.Expected Result: The chat window opens and displays the initial message.

Steps.Step Description: User sends a message in the chat.
Steps.Expected Result: The message appears in the chat window.

Steps.Step Description: User minimizes the chat and navigates away to another game mode.
Steps.Expected Result: The chat remains open and minimized.

Steps.Step Description: User returns to the original game mode.
Steps.Expected Result: The chat is still present in the minimized state.

Steps.Step Description: User restores the chat.
Steps.Expected Result: All messages, including the user message, are displayed correctly.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has initiated the Numera chat and sent messages.
test_cases.Expected Result: User messages are retained successfully while switching modes.
test_cases._polarion: Caso d'uso 6 - Ripresa della conversazione dopo passaggio ad altre modalità di gioco
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Focuses on message retention only; does not cover functionality of the AI responses.

test_cases.Title: Chat State Preservation_003_Client_GNTN_TEST_Desktop_Ensuring all chat state elements are maintained

Steps.Step Description: User initiates the chat and interacts with AI Angel Numera.
Steps.Expected Result: Chat initializes correctly with initial messages.

Steps.Step Description: User sends several messages and receives responses.
Steps.Expected Result: All exchanges between user and AI are logged accurately.

Steps.Step Description: User minimizes the chat and switches to another game mode.
Steps.Expected Result: The chat remains active in the background.

Steps.Step Description: User clicks 'Continue the conversation' after returning.
Steps.Expected Result: The chat restores with all previous messages intact and input field unchanged.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has started a conversation with AI Angel Numera.

test_cases.Title: login_error_handling_XXX_USECASE_Login_TEST_web_attempting to login with invalid credentials
